Package cli

Class SetupCLI

java.lang.Object
cli.SetupCLI
public class SetupCLI extends Object
The Class SetupCLI. This is the command line interface for setting up the game. This class and all methods are only called at the start of the game.

  • Method Details

    • startNewGame

      public void startNewGame()
      Method called only at start Starts a new game. Get's user input using UserInput. User input is then called into other methods in this class

    • startUserName

      public String startUserName()
      Obtain's a user's name. Checks to ensure that it is an appropriate length and has the correct characters.
      Returns:
      the name.

    • startGameDays

      public int startGameDays()
      Obtains from the user how many day's the user would like to play for.
      Returns:
      the int number of days.

    • startSelectMonster

      public int startSelectMonster()
      Allows the user to select a starting monster.
      Returns:
      the int, representing which monster the user has selected

    • willRenameMonster

      public boolean willRenameMonster()
      Checks if the user would like to rename their monster
      Returns:
      the string, either y for yes or n for no

    • startDifficulty

      public String startDifficulty()
      Collect's the user's difficulty level
      Returns:
      the string, either "Easy" or "Hard"

    • starterMonsterSelect

      Parameters:

      Returns:
